title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Scenarios for Integrated Writing Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic academic writing structures and intermediate-level English writing proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of source-based integrated writing assessment tasks
Learners can develop assessment criteria for writing academic argumentative essays by analyzing given texts
Learners can propose feedback strategies appropriate for learners at various proficiency levels

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
